attributes.additional_details:
Please extend the stamp duty by two more months.
I would like an extend on the stamp duty for a next two months to take the pressure off solicitors to complete
attributes.background: Please extend the house stamp duty for two more months to take pressure of solicitors and people who just going to miss it by two weeks

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Extend Stamp Duty Holiday for people that have had an offer accepted
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584239

Extending Stamp Duty Holiday until December 31 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583891
